title: Integrated Teacher Hard Skills & Soft Skills Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of teaching theories and at least one year of practical classroom experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning program using digital devices, aimed at enhancing immediately applicable competencies for practicing teachers.

learning_goals: The ability to apply three or more instructional strategies tailored to learner characteristics in lesson design can be enhanced by incorporating mentor feedback
Soft skill (communication/leadership) evaluation scores of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) can be achieved from over 80% of participants in field practice
Two or more revised lesson operation plans and improvement proposals can be submitted based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
